item.title: FHN
item.description: score:61 Chances: First Horizon Corp. (FHN) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report. The company has been recognized for its commitments to employee health and well-being, which could reflect positively in its overall performance.
